channel.title: Zeus Red Update Feed
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2022.600.0.125
item.author: gms2@yoyogames.com (gms2 optional)
item.description:
This first June’s Beta introduces more functionality for extensions; lots of fixes for Feather and also the current Syntax Errors system; changes the Switch crash-reporter to be Nintendo’s own system; and brings microphone support to Opera GX. Alongside those new features, we have a large number of bug fixes already.

Lots more features will be coming in future Betas.

Please review the whole of the IDE and the runtime notes carefully, as there are a lot of changes and things to be aware of in this new release. See below for IDE changes/fixes and check the Runtime Release Notes for in-game changes/fixes.
